statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 20 \\ 10 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 50 \\ -60 \\ -33 \\ 30 \\ -15 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
